review: Awesome deal ... fast and very snappy .. i ordered on one to review and am happy I did.. ordered another two for gifts to the family

review: It's working fine and I love it
author: Amazon Customer

review: So far, I have enjoyed having the Fire TV stick. I was a little disappointed with how many things you have to pay for with the Fire Stick. I planned on cancelling my pay channels with DirecTV and using the Fire Stick for movies, but after using it for a week I think I may keep my movie channels and use this occasionally when new movies come out. All in all I like the product but was hoping for more movies and shows to be included with my Prime membership.
author: Jason
